attributes.action: Stop MPs blocking scheduled debates by making excessively long speeches.
attributes.additional_details: This is not the only example of this and it makes a mockery of a system which is meant to be democratic.
attributes.background: Caroline Lucas tried to introduce the NHS Reinstatement Bill, however backbench MPs used up scheduled time making excessively long speeches on a short bill which had already been debated. This may be viewed as a deliberate attempt to block the bill through undemoocratic methods and should be banned.
